obj.method: (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`type` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`playerId` int(11) NOT NULL,`createAt` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`attackPlayerName` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,`extra` varchar(150) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,`leftList` blob,`eventList` blob,`hurtList` blob,`list` blob,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),KEY `playerId` (`playerId`),KEY `createAt` (`createAt`) USING BTREE) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`type` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`playerId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`num` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`createAt` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`year` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`month` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`day` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`propSid` int(6) DEFAULT NULL,`nowLeft` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`state` tinyint(2) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),KEY `playerId` (`playerId`) USING BTREE,KEY `type` (`type`) USING BTREE,KEY `createAt` (`createAt`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`type` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`playerId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`num` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`createAt` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`year` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`month` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`day` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`propSid` int(6) DEFAULT NULL,`nowLeft` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`state` tinyint(2) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),KEY `playerId` (`playerId`) USING BTREE,KEY `type` (`type`) USING BTREE,KEY `createAt` (`createAt`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`type` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`playerId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`allianceId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`num` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`createAt` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`year` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`month` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`day` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`nowLeft` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`state` tinyint(2) DEFAULT NULL,`style` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`extra` varchar(150) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),KEY `allianceId` (`allianceId`) USING BTREE,KEY `type` (`type`) USING BTREE,KEY `createAt` (`createAt`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`rankvalue` varchar(150) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,`type` tinyint(2) DEFAULT NULL,`battleisland` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`num` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`createAt` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`year` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`month` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`day` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`stage` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`state` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`stime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`etime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`allianceId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`players` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),KEY `allianceId` (`allianceId`) USING BTREE,KEY `createAt` (`createAt`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`type` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`reason` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`playerId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`num` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`createAt` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`item_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`year` smallint(6) DEFAULT NULL,`month` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`day` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`equipSid` int(6) DEFAULT NULL,`nowLeft` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),KEY `playerId` (`playerId`) USING BTREE,KEY `type` (`type`) USING BTREE,KEY `createAt` (`createAt`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`type` tinyint(4) NOT NULL,`playerId` int(11) NOT NULL,`propSid` int(11) NOT NULL,`num` int(11) NOT NULL,`createAt` int(11) NOT NULL,`needTime` int(11) NOT NULL,`buildIndex` int(11) NOT NULL,`buildSid` int(11) NOT NULL,`buildLv` int(11) NOT NULL,`productId` int(11) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),KEY `createAt` (`createAt`) USING BTREE,KEY `playerId_propSid` (`playerId`,`propSid`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`type` tinyint(4) NOT NULL,`playerId` int(11) NOT NULL,`propSid` int(11) NOT NULL,`createAt` int(11) NOT NULL,`invokeNum` int(11) NOT NULL,`leftNum` int(11) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),KEY `createAt` (`createAt`) USING BTREE,KEY `playerId` (`playerId`),KEY `propSid` (`propSid`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`type` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`reason` int(6) DEFAULT NULL,`playerId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`num` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`createAt` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`item_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`officerSid` int(6) DEFAULT NULL,`nowLeft` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),KEY `playerId` (`playerId`) USING BTREE,KEY `type` (`type`) USING BTREE,KEY `createAt` (`createAt`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

(`id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,`bindType` tinyint NOT NULL ,`trackType` tinyint NOT NULL ,`actionType` tinyint NOT NULL ,`uid` int NOT NULL ,`pid` int NULL ,`time` int NOT NULL ,`operateInfo` varchar(255) NULL ,`lastRecord` varchar(255) NULL ,`currentRecord` varchar(255) NULL ,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),INDEX (`time`) ,INDEX (`uid`) ,INDEX (`pid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
